name: Scribble Golf!
description:
Try the new multiplayer slingshot golf!

Easy controls and addictive game play!

Play with real players around the world.

150+ puzzle golf stages and 12 character, 25 clubs and balls.

Beat opponents and make it to the top on the rank!
We are finding golf genius. It's you!

FEATURES:
- Multiplayer slingshot golf.
- 150+ puzzle golf stages.
- Unlock & upgrade your characters, clubs and ball.
- Easy controls and addictive game play.
- 8 chapters and more chapters are coming.
- Appealing 3d graphics.

Opponents around the world are waiting for you! Download Scribble golf!
This game needs an internet connection to play
